about_the_game:
Ever since the Age of the Deep began, and humanity was reduced to the endangered species list, there has been a tumultuous peace between the factions of the world of Hathanna.

The various harbor towns of Survivors, just trying to get by and reestablish a foothold for humanity through negotiation and mutual cooperation.

A faction of mer and men known as The Red Tide who seek their own power and influence using any means at their disposal.

The Melenai, the race of mer who evolved from the humans lucky enough to survive 0 AOD, who now control the most valuable resource on the planet and dabble in the governance of humanity.

You will play as one of the mer and investigate a bizarre shift in the balance of power taking place in the living sea.

Loot

Chase down rare equipment and resources from within shipwrecks, enemies or around the world.

Upgrade Loot

You can upgrade your equipment at certain crafting tables by using resources you have collected.

Level Up

Looking good while you slay is only part of the fun. Leveling up grants bonuses to passive stats and unlocks points for you to use to aid you in facing tougher enemies and to help find the rarest resources.

Explore

The ocean isn't just full of horror, there is wonder and serenity to be found around the islands and the coral reefs that you will visit on your journey.

short_description: Age of the Deep is a mermaid fashion looter rpg. Explore the beautiful, and terrifying, mysteries of the ocean surrounding the islands, fight off pirates that threaten the inhabitants, dive deep to uncover mysteries and equip the latest in swimwear to boost your stats.
